title: Can we throw away papers that have Abdullah, Adbur Rahman or Allah's Names written in English #assim
transcript: hello um I have a question so my name is ABD my name ISD and I receive a lot of mail or packages with my name on it in English as well as Arabic sometimes since it has the name of Allah in it or anyone with the name of Allah such as abdan would it be Haram to throw those papers out if yes as long as it's written as long as it's written in English there is no problem in that insh for
